column2: I read it. Maybe I'm mistaken, but… *Gordon frowns.* How do I put it? You called it strange. But it is not strange. That creature didn't strike me that way.
Why not?
I wanted to ask you about a different thing. The Gardener said he had seen Aurora 1. Do you think it's true?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
We could understand it. W-w-which means it isn't that different from us, psychologically speaking.
I wanted to ask you about a different thing. The Gardener said he had seen Aurora 1. Do you think it's true?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
I w-wouldn't take it seriously. We do not have the time.
Yeah. True. You're right.
You're right, of course, but don't you want to help our guys?
Gordon, we have to save our comrades.
*Gordon nods.*
You didn't think the Gardener was weird. Why is that?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
But… what about the rest of the planet?
You didn't think the Gardener was weird. Why is that?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
But… if we were to try to find them, how would we do that? We… we would just vanish! We would let everyone down! C-Captain, that would be... irrational.
You didn't think the Gardener was weird. Why is that?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
Apparently, it's s-s-some code of conduct, a lifestyle… maybe even something religious. Who would have thought? I thought s-s-space was no place for such things...
You didn't think the Gardener was weird. Why is that?
I wanted to ask you about a different thing. The Gardener said he had seen Aurora 1. Do you think it's true?
What is the Philosophy of the Path?
So that's what you think… Okay. I'm glad I know your opinion about this. Over and out.
